mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.sushe_id as susheId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,sushe.sushe_name as susheName ,sushe.sushe_address as susheAddress ,sushe.sushe_content as susheContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM sushe_renruan a left JOIN sushe sushe ON a.sushe_id = sushe.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.sushe_id = #{params.susheId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.sushe_id IS NOT NULL
and sushe.sushe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheName},'%')
and sushe.sushe_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheAddress},'%')
and sushe.sushe_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
